content.title: Acute Limb Ischemia Definition
content.definition: Acute limb ischemia is sudden decrease in limb perfusion causing a potential threat to limb viability, typically symptoms <14 days.
content.statement: Acute Limb Ischemia Definition is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Acute-Limb-Ischemia that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
